official_title: A Randomized Trial Comparing the Effectiveness of Polyp Resection Treatments (Hot Snare vs Cold Snare vs Hot EMR vs Cold EMR)
inclusion_criteria:
* Aged 40 years or older
* Ability to provide informed consent
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 40 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Subjects with a history of Inflammatory Bowel Disease
* Lesions less than 6mm or greater than 15mm in largest dimension
